text:
[Verse]
Bright stars in the night
Shining so high
No fears no fright
Just you and I

[Verse 2]
Dancing light beams
In the sky above
Chasing our dreams
Bound by love

[Chorus]
Stars in the night
Lighting up the dark
Hearts feeling right
Igniting that spark

[Verse 3]
Moonlight glow
Soft and kind
Feel the flow
Free your mind

[Chorus]
Stars in the night
Lighting up the dark
Hearts feeling right
Igniting that spark

[Bridge]
Every twinkle tells a tale
Of a time we hold dear
Stars never fail
Bringing us near
title: Stars in the Night
